dataset.title: Award Data Archive
dataset.description: The Award Data Archive features major agencies award transaction data for full fiscal years.

distribution.title: varies according to GUI filter selections

dataset.title: Custom Award Data
dataset.description: Custom Award Data provides GUI-selectable composition of award data retrieval. Selections available are: award level (Prime Awards, Sub-Awards), award types (Contracts, Direct Payments, Grants, IDVs, Loans and Other Financial Assistance), awarding agency and sub-agency, recipient location, date type and date range. Downloading this data gives you access to every attribute of any particular award, including data that may not be surfaced on this site.

distribution.title: varies according to GUI filter selections

dataset.title: Custom Account Data
dataset.description: Account data provides GUI-selectable filtering which covers all spending data, including non-award spending. The data is available on two different levels, federal account and treasury account. Federal account data is essentially a roll-up of multiple treasury account data. The files available are categorized by type, according to the scope of spending they cover. More information on the different file types can be found in our Custom Account Data Dictionary. The Account data contains the most encompassing amounts of spending throughout U.S. government agencies. Unlike award data, account data include spending that is not tied to awards, such as operational costs and employee salaries.

distribution.title: varies according to GUI filter selections

dataset.title: Agency USAspending DABS Submissions
dataset.description: Provides access to original source data files submitted by agencies to the DATA act. Files are accessed by a GUI hierarchy of year and agency.

distribution.title: varies according to GUI filter selections

dataset.title: Agency USAspending FABS Submissions
dataset.description: Provides access to original source data files submitted by agencies to the DATA act. Files are accessed by a GUI hierarchy of year and agency.

distribution.description: GUI-filtered selection of download files by agency, award type, and fiscal year
distribution.title: varies according to GUI filter selections

dataset.title: USAspending Database Downloads
dataset.description: Provides the entire data set used by USAspending.gov as a PostgreSQL archive, which includes DATA Act data from Fiscal Year 2001 to present. Additionally a much smaller subset of data is available for developers or testers as PostgreSQL archive with enough data flor locally testinga random sampling of awards, submission, and reference data. Database download archives are generated on a monthly basis.

distribution.description: Web browser selectable complete and reduce PostgreSQL download links
distribution.title: varies according to GUI filter selections

dataset.title: API
dataset.description: The USAspending API (Application Programming Interface) allows the public to access comprehensive U.S. government spending data.The data include spending on awards (e.g., who received federal contracts or grants, geographic breakdowns, agency breakdowns, and much more). The data also include account-level, non-award spending such as federal employee compensation. You can learn more about the data and the federal law that requires it to be publicly accessible (the DATA Act) at http://fedspendingtransparency.github.io.
